"Akatsuki": "Oh, hey. You must be the \"Meteorn\" from Central I've heard about."
"I've been in Stia for a while, myself. Let me help you however I can."
"I wanted to have a proper talk with you."
"I'm Akatsuki. In this vanguard unit, I serve as Commander of the 1st Combat Platoon."
"I've heard a lot about you from Bruder."
"Bruder and I are old friends, you see. I've known him since his rookie days."
"I've been interested in the person he would speak so highly of as an ARKS."
"I have just the right request on hand. I'd like you to accept it, if that's alright."
"I want you to defeat \"Scout Wasps\" within Dreisen Plant."
"Standard procedure is to quickly destroy them before they can call for reinforcements."
"I look forward to what sort of results you'll give me."
"I see... Come back when you have the time."
